section.p: To switch to another parameter set for the current document, do one of the following:

li.p: Select the set from the XSLT Parameter Set drop-down list on the toolbar.

Check the View Stylesheet Parameters
<SET NAME>
menu item.

section.p: When the active XSLT parameter set is changed, your document will be reformatted with XSLT parameter values taken from the new parameter set.
